name: ProjectMembership
description: Medplum project membership. A project membership grants a user access to a project.

properties.name: ProjectMembership
properties.short: Medplum project membership. A project membership grants a user access to a project.
properties.definition: Medplum project membership. A project membership grants a user access to a project.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

properties.name: meta
properties.definition: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

properties.name: implicitRules
properties.definition: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

properties.name: language
properties.definition: The base language in which the resource is written.

properties.name: project
properties.definition: Project where the memberships are available.

properties.name: invitedBy
properties.definition: The project administrator who invited the user to the project.

properties.name: user
properties.definition: User that is granted access to the project.

properties.name: profile
properties.definition: Reference to the resource that represents the user profile within the project.

properties.name: externalId
properties.definition: A String that is an identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.  The "externalId" may simplify identification of a resource between the provisioning client and the service provider by allowing the client to use a filter to locate the resource with an identifier from the provisioning domain, obviating the need to store a local mapping between the provisioning domain's identifier of the resource and the identifier used by the service provider.  Each resource MAY include a non-empty "externalId" value.  The value of the "externalId" attribute is always issued by the provisioning client and MUST NOT be specified by the service provider.  The service provider MUST always interpret the externalId as scoped to the provisioning domain.

properties.name: accessPolicy
properties.definition: The access policy for the user within the project memebership.

properties.name: access
properties.definition: Extended access configuration using parameterized access policies.

properties.name: policy
properties.definition: The base access policy used as a template.  Variables in the template access policy are replaced by the values in the parameter.

properties.name: parameter
properties.definition: User options that control the display of the application.

properties.name: name
properties.definition: The unique name of the parameter.

properties.name: value[x]
properties.definition: Value of the parameter - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](extensibility.html) for a list).

properties.name: userConfiguration
properties.definition: The user configuration for the user within the project memebership such as menu links, saved searches, and features.

properties.name: admin
properties.short: Whether this user is a project administrator.
properties.definition: Whether this user is a project administrator.

searchParameters.name: project
searchParameters.description: The project associated with the project membership

searchParameters.name: user
searchParameters.description: The user associated with the project membership

searchParameters.name: profile
searchParameters.description: The user profile associated with the project membership

searchParameters.name: profile-type
searchParameters.description: Resource type of the user profile associated with the project membership

searchParameters.name: access-policy
searchParameters.description: The access policy of the user
